name: Kawaii Evolution Clicker
description:
The long-awaited clicker about the evolution of anime girls: get your collection of kawaii cute chans!

Become a senpai for schoolgirls, among whom present all anime characters, including tsundere, kuudere, yandere and many others.
Visit mansion of Onii-chan, where cute sisters and childhood friend are waiting for you.
The capital of cosplay - Akihabara. In maid cafe you will be met by a kawaii maido, gothic lolita and of course neko-chan.

This is an addicting and simple game where you will find your favorite anime characters:
kuudere, tsundere, yandere, moe, sisters (loli, imouto, onee-san), neko-chan, cosplayers, schoolgirls and many others!

How to play:
Click on the characters, get coins, merge two identical girls to evolve in the new one. Other stunning locations are waiting for you in Map.
Very soon we will release updates with new locations and characters.
We try to keep as little ads in the game as possible, which can be turned off completely by in-app purchase.
Dear player, thanks in advance, your purchases are very helpful and support further development!

You might even find your waifu.
It's not like i like you or anything. Baka!
